questions.text: Which is the major mineral resource of KPK?
questions.explanation: Marble is one of the major mineral resources of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.

questions.text: Warsak Dam is located near which city?
questions.explanation: Warsak Dam is located on the Kabul River, about 30 km northwest of Peshawar.

questions.text: Which fruit is KPK most famous for producing?
questions.explanation: KPK, especially Swat, is famous for producing apples, peaches, and other temperate fruits.

questions.text: The Hayatabad Industrial Estate is located in:
questions.explanation: Hayatabad Industrial Estate is a major industrial area in Peshawar.

questions.text: Which sector contributes most to KPK's economy?
questions.explanation: Agriculture contributes significantly to KPK's economy, employing a large portion of the workforce.

questions.text: Tobacco is a major crop of which district in KPK?
questions.explanation: Swabi and Charsadda districts are known for tobacco cultivation in KPK.

questions.text: The Gadoon Amazai Industrial Estate is located in:
questions.explanation: Gadoon Amazai Industrial Estate is located in Swabi district.

questions.text: Which forest type is most common in KPK?
questions.explanation: Coniferous forests (deodar, pine, fir) are the most common forest type in KPK's northern areas.

questions.text: The Pak-Afghan Transit Trade Agreement benefits which province most?
questions.explanation: KPK benefits most from the transit trade agreement due to its border with Afghanistan.

questions.text: Ghee and sugar mills are concentrated in which area of KPK?
questions.explanation: The Peshawar Valley, especially Mardan and Charsadda, has several sugar and ghee mills.
